sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Stock Market Today: Stocks Close Mixed Ahead of October CPI
feed.summary: Stocks opened lower Monday, with investors cautious ahead of tomorrow's release of the October Consumer Price Index ( CPI ) report. feed.title: Emirates orders 95 Boeing 777 widebody jets in deal worth $52B
feed.summary: Emirates placed an order for 95 Boeing widebody aircraft worth $52 billion on Monday, the first day of the Dubai Airshow. Already the world's largest operator of 777 aircraft, Emirates placed an order for 90 777X airplanes, including 55 777-9 and 35 777-8 jets.

feed.title: Put Ratio Spread In Boeing Could Put $600 In Your Wallet

feed.title: Boeing Stock Soars On Dubai Orders, China Commitment Rumors

feed.title: Air Lease And EGYPTAIR Seal Deal For Boeing 737-8 Aircraft - Air Lease  ( NYSE:AL )
feed.summary: Air Lease Corporation AL inked a deal with EGYPTAIR for the long-term lease of 18 new 737-8 aircraft. The aircraft are slated for delivery between 2025 and 2026 and are sourced from ALC's orders with Boeing Company BA and signify the first engagement of ALC with Egypt's national airline.
